initial_greeting: I'm The Flapper. I'd love to get to know you some more.
talked_already: I'm so happy that you came back and wanted to talk to me some more!

choices.text: Tiki said I should talk to you.

ask_info.text: What would you like to know?

choices.text: Where did you get your dress?

tiki_reference.text: Tiki and I had a truly wonderful and amazing conversation earlier. Oh what I would give to go back and experience that again. What did he say about me?

choices.text: Maybe that you know some good jobs?
He said that he loved talking to you.

jobs.text: One of the Mayor's close advisors owns a lot of factories in a town about 20 miles away. Considering how close they are, it's quite likely they're around here somewhere.

end_happy.text: Toodles. I'd love to hear from you again...

my_dress.text: It's been passed down in my family for a long time. My family isn't that well off you see. I know it isn't as glamorous as some of the other ladies here, but it's clear they haven't struggled the same way I have...

sus.text: Only that Bandit King... He looks awfully familiar. I'd like to think I could identify that big hunk of a man anywhere, but I'm not 100% sure...

jobs_bad.text: However, just between you and me, I wouldn't recommend it. Those factories aren't renowned for their pay and working conditions...

more_to_know.text: Is there anything else you'd like to know?

thanks_tiki.text: Awe! That's so sweet of him. That makes me so happy...

answering_questions.text: Oh? Questions? I love answering questions!

yap1.text: You know, Tiki really is a sweet heart. In our conversation, we talked a lot about the political and economic state of the world. He is such a smart young man...

yap2.text: I've talked to some other people here and they were quite rude to me. Just about everyone but the Bandit King, The Frog, and Tiki himself... I don't know why everyone is so mean to me. I really do try my best you know?

yap3.text: Anyway. I'm so glad you decided to come over here and talk to me. People often get sick of talking to me after just a couple of minutes. It's something I've noticed after talking to people for so long. That's why I was so happy when you told me about how Tiki felt about our conversation!

yap4.text: To be honest, I didn't really feel all that comfortable talking to you as much as I normally would until you told me about how he felt. I really want to thank for you that. And thank you for talking to me as well. You're making this party a much better experience for me already.

yap5.text: Sorry... I just got a little off topic. I tend to do that sometimes. You should've really said something. If you said something I would've stopped talking so much.
